Dorothy Christopher

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Theodore and Anna Thunker Ausdemore
  3. Location of Family: Crofton, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Hartington, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1910-05-28, New York City, NY
  8. Date of Death: 2000-12-21
  9. Gender: female
  10. Married Name: Dorothy De Blauw
  11. Spouse Name: Martin De Blauw
  12. Source: Crofton Journal, 28 December 2000; National Orphan Train Complex; Crofton Journal, 8 October 1987; Columbus Telegram, December 2000; Living Here, Winter 2007; Eloise Thomsen Corres. under Wilson; Social Security Death Index; Crofton Journal, 3 October 1912.
